title: Strengthening Nursing Practice Competencies: Analysis of Organizational Learning Influences and Strategic Application

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of organizational behavior theory, basic data analysis, and knowledge management concepts
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for medical/nursing field practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can empirically analyze the impact of organizational culture types (clan, hierarchy) on organizational learning.
Learners can verify the pathways through which knowledge and technical competencies influence organizational learning outcomes using structural equation modeling.
Based on research findings, practical strategies can be proposed to enhance organizational learning.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
